profileAlternative.name: Hari Mohanraj
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Data Scientist at Shipt
profileAlternative.summary:
I'm a data scientist-engineer with experience in building production-quality data products from the ground up. I enjoy tackling unstructured business problems and building out deployable solutions.

My tools of choice are Python / R / SQL for prototyping, interactive data analysis, and model building. I tend to lean on the AWS ecosystem for standing up scalable production services.

I'm interested in learning more about and working on problems where deep learning is applicable (image processing, NLP).

aboutAlternative.text:

My tools of choice are Python / R / SQL for prototyping, interactive data analysis, and model building. I tend to lean on the AWS ecosystem for standing up scalable production services.

positions.title: Project Lead & Fellow
positions.description:
- Project lead for 4-person team offering pro-bono data consulting services to nonprofits soliciting analytics expertise as part of Delta Analytics’ 2019 Fellowship.
- Work with the Open Media Foundation to develop a visualization tool that enables constituents to inspect and be notified of conversations about important issues taking place in their local governments.

positions.title: Senior Data Scientist
positions.description:
- 3rd data science hire; acquired by Target in December 2017 for $550 million
- Served as technical lead on cross-functional projects spanning Data Science, Data Engineering, and Operations
- Assisted in recruiting and technical interviewing as we grew the Data organization...

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Data Scientist @ Shipt | Pairing People & Data to Solve Problems
Director of Product, previously at Flipkart, Rocket Internet and startups
